Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. Since our elderly have been reduced to a mere 1% of the population, they have a regeneration time of 24 hours. Or so I am told,

The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. Since our elderly have been reduced to a mere 1% of the population, they have a regeneration time of 24 hours. Or so I am told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have a

The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The so I am told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty so I am told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least tha I am told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when hum

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a

Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know m

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Ty

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tr

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe.

The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, who was with me at the time, told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'.

We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought toge

Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I devel

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a night pat

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol w

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol when it seemed quie

Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol w

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't beli

We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yestewith a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade. I crushed that tyrant

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade. I crushed that tyrant with a boulder, and I screamed in agony when I saw Harry's body.

But I will mov

I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade. I crushed that tyrant with a boulder, and I screamed in agony when I saw Harry's body.

But I will move on and continue to

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humanity have collectedly started to glow a blue hue, and the more mana you use at a certain time, the glow reduces to what humans normally look like. The time your mana replenishes also depends on how healthy you are. Mine refreshes from depletion every 6 hours. Some very active humans have a mana regeneration time of 2 hours. The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade. I crushed that tyrant with a boulder, and I screamed in agony when I saw Harry's body.

But I will move on and continue to avenge Harry. We

The elderly can replenish for around twenty four hour or so.  At least that's what I was told, as I haven't seen any elderly since the aliens have declared war against us. We call them the 'Tyrants' as they are the reason why humanity has been reduced to a mere 1% of the population.

The Tyrants had the majority of us got killed for quite such a short time. They were powerful, and they were ruthless. But when humans started to glow, we realize we could fight back. Every human has a unique power. Some can control the elements, some can manipulate the weather, and some can even heal. I did not know my power until I was attacked by a Tyrant. I had a huge cut in my arm and I was bleeding out. To stop the Tyrant from further attacks, I tried to imagine a wall of stone blocking the alien from me. Suddenly, the ground started to shake and a huge wall of stone rose from the ground. The Tyrant was trapped in the stone, and I was safe. 

My friend, named Harry, was a fire manipulator. He told me that I was a 'Stone Shaper'. We fought together against the Tyrants.  I developed feelings for Harry, and during a particular night patrol we kissed. 

I still couldn't believe he's gone. I was in the middle of a battle yesterday with a Tyrant when Harry came to my rescue. His heart was pierced by a Tyrant's blade. I crushed that tyrant with a boulder, and I screamed in agony when I saw Harry's body.

But I will move on and continue to avenge Harry. We will not live in fear of the Tyrants.
